Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink '348'. Name Melanthios. An example in Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, is from the same die.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (347)
